mapper.select: select reservations_id,non_member_name,reserve_days,reserve_time,menu_name,menu_times from reservations inner join menu on reservations.menu_id = menu.menu_id where reserve_days = #{day} and reservations.delete_flag = 0 order by reserve_days,reserve_time asc

select reservations_id,non_member_name,reserve_days,reserve_time,menu_name,menu_times from reservations inner join menu on reservations.menu_id = menu.menu_id where reservations.reserve_days = #{day} or reservations.non_member_name = #{name} and reservations.delete_flag = 0 order by reserve_days,reserve_time desc
select * from reservations where #{today} <= reserve_days and member_id = #{member_id} and delete_flag = 0
select * from reservations where #{today} > reserve_days and member_id = #{member_id} and delete_flag = 0 order by reserve_days asc
mapper.update: update reservations set delete_flag = 1 where reservations_id = #{cancel_id}
mapper.insert: insert into reservations( menu_id, non_member_name, non_member_email, non_member_phone_number, reserve_days, reserve_time, delete_flag ) values( #{menu_id}, #{non_member_name}, #{non_member_email}, #{non_member_phone_number}, #{reserve_days}, #{reserve_time}, 0 )
